installation_methods.command: wget https://REMnux.org/remnux-cli && chmod +x remnux-cli && sudo ./remnux-cli install

authentication.notes: COMPLETELY FREE! All SANS community tools, cheat sheets, and resources are freely available. No registration required.

description: SANS DFIR (Digital Forensics and Incident Response) - FREE tools and resources from the world's leading cybersecurity training organization for incident response and forensics.

bash.sift_setup:
#!/bin/bash
# SIFT Workstation Setup - FREE!

echo "[*] SIFT Workstation Setup (COMPLETELY FREE!)"
echo "============================================"
echo ""

echo "[+] Installation Methods:"
echo "    # Install on Ubuntu"
echo "    wget https://github.com/teamdfir/sift-cli/releases/download/v1.14.0-rc1/sift-cli-linux"
echo "    chmod +x sift-cli-linux"
echo "    sudo ./sift-cli-linux install"
echo ""
echo "    # Download VM"
echo "    https://github.com/teamdfir/sift/releases"
echo ""

echo "[+] Key Tools Included:"
echo "    - Autopsy - Disk forensics GUI"
echo "    - Volatility - Memory forensics"
echo "    - Sleuth Kit - File system tools"
echo "    - Timeline tools"
echo "    - Registry analyzers"
echo "    - Log parsers"
echo "    - Network forensics"
echo ""

echo "[+] REMnux Setup:"
echo "    wget https://REMnux.org/remnux-cli"
echo "    chmod +x remnux-cli"
echo "    sudo ./remnux-cli install"
echo ""

echo "[+] Resources:"
echo "    - SIFT: https://www.sans.org/tools/sift-workstation/"
echo "    - REMnux: https://remnux.org/"
echo "    - Cheat Sheets: https://www.sans.org/posters/"
echo ""

echo "[!] 100% FREE - No license required!"

curl.get_sift:
# Download SIFT CLI - FREE!
wget https://github.com/teamdfir/sift-cli/releases/download/v1.14.0-rc1/sift-cli-linux
chmod +x sift-cli-linux
sudo ./sift-cli-linux install

python.dfir_toolkit:
import os
import subprocess
from typing import Dict, List

class SANSDFIRToolkit:
    """SANS DFIR Toolkit Guide - COMPLETELY FREE!"""
    
    def __init__(self):
        self.sift_url = 'https://github.com/teamdfir/sift'
        self.remnux_url = 'https://remnux.org'
        
    def sift_tools_overview(self):
        """SIFT Workstation tools (FREE!)"""
        print("== SIFT Workstation Tools (COMPLETELY FREE!)\n")
        
        categories = {
            'Disk Forensics': [
                'Autopsy - GUI forensics platform',
                'Sleuth Kit - Command line tools',
                'dc3dd - Advanced dd imaging',
                'ewftools - E01 format support',
                'qemu - Virtual machine support'
            ],
            'Memory Forensics': [
                'Volatility 2 & 3 - Memory analysis',
                'LiME - Linux memory acquisition',
                'DumpIt - Windows memory acquisition',
                'Rekall - Memory forensics framework'
            ],
            'Timeline Analysis': [
                'log2timeline/plaso - Super timeline',
                'Timesketch - Timeline analysis',
                'mactime - MAC time analysis',
                'fls - File listing with times'
            ],
            'Registry & Artifacts': [
                'RegRipper - Registry analysis',
                'ShimCacheParser - Shimcache parsing',
                'AmcacheParser - Amcache analysis',
                'USBDeviceForensics - USB history'
            ],
            'Network Forensics': [
                'Wireshark - Packet analysis',
                'NetworkMiner - Network forensics',
                'tcpdump - Packet capture',
                'tshark - Command line Wireshark'
            ]
        }
        
        for category, tools in categories.items():
            print(f"[+] {category}:")
            for tool in tools:
                print(f"    - {tool}")
            print()
        
        return categories
    
    def remnux_tools_overview(self):
        """REMnux malware analysis tools (FREE!)"""
        print("== REMnux Malware Analysis Tools (FREE!)\n")
        
        categories = {
            'Static Analysis': [
                'PEfile - PE analysis',
                'strings - Extract strings',
                'hexdump - Hex viewer',
                'binwalk - Firmware analysis',
                'YARA - Pattern matching'
            ],
            'Dynamic Analysis': [
                'Cuckoo Sandbox - Automated analysis',
                'Fakenet-NG - Network simulation',
                'Process Monitor - Process tracking',
                'API Monitor - API call tracking'
            ],
            'Deobfuscation': [
                'de4js - JavaScript deobfuscation',
                'uncompyle6 - Python decompiler',
                'jadx - Java/Android decompiler',
                'dnSpy - .NET decompiler'
            ],
            'Document Analysis': [
                'oledump - OLE file analysis',
                'pdf-parser - PDF analysis',
                'pdfid - PDF identification',
                'rtfdump - RTF analysis'
            ]
        }
        
        for category, tools in categories.items():
            print(f"[+] {category}:")
            for tool in tools:
                print(f"    - {tool}")
            print()
        
        return categories
    
    def cheat_sheets_list(self):
        """SANS cheat sheets (FREE!)"""
        print("== SANS DFIR Cheat Sheets (FREE!)\n")
        
        sheets = [
            'DFIR Command Line',
            'Windows Forensic Analysis',
            'Linux Forensic Survival',
            'Memory Forensics',
            'Hex and Regex',
            'PowerShell Cheat Sheet',
            'SIFT Workstation Guide',
            'REMnux Usage Guide',
            'Malware Analysis',
            'Network Forensics'
        ]
        
        print("Available Cheat Sheets:")
        for sheet in sheets:
            print(f"  - {sheet}")
        
        print("\nDownload from: https://www.sans.org/posters/")
        
        return sheets

name: SANS DFIR Tools
